content: An amusing little quote from this last December by a conservative watchdog group… “The Secret Service and the Air Force are being abused by unnecessary travel,” Tom Fitton, president of Judicial Watch, said in a statement on the matter. “Unnecessary presidential travel for fundraising and luxury vacations on the taxpayers’ dime would be a good target for reform for the incoming Trump administration.” Yep, the Trump administration will be getting to that real soon. I believe it’s penciled in to be discussed at tonight's midnight buffet (you really need to try the Foie Gras, it’s exquisite!)
